no entiendo que necesidad de que las cajas para abrir SIEMPRE dropean skines de un valor insignificante, sacan las ganas de todo, te cobran 167 $ para abrir una caja y encima te tira skines de 0.10$ , empiecen a pensar en los player un poco, no todo es enriqueserse a costa de otros.

Merci d'avoir complétement pourri l'expérience de jeu en le rendant gratuit. La multiplication de cheater ne permet à aucun nouveau joueur de prendre un minimum de plaisir et le niveau a tellement chuté, on trouve des mecs à des haut elo qui sont nuuuuuuuuuuuuls. Et tellement toxic. Allez mourir.

Jogo dês de 2013-2014, o jogo ja foi muito melhor antigamente mas continua sendo um cs. Valia a pena quando ele era pago agora que é gratuito vale mais ainda, porem a taxa de hackers subiu muito por causa disso, mas os servidores da comunidade salvam de mais, sao muito fodas de vdd, bhope, jailbreak, zombies, tive a oportunidade de conhecer muitas pessoas incriveis nesses modos, vale muito a pena msm.

When you play this game you are essentially mocking yourself, literally doing anything else is much better. Everyone uses cheats: aim bot, wall hack, anti aim... I watch replies after playing and I see how the other players are aiming away from me, but still they killed me with a head shot. And this happens game after game. I play with other friends, we are a team of 5, we are on discord while playing, trying out tactics and coordinating and see how the opponents know our position, just came out of nowhere shooting straight at us or we are aiming and shooting directly on head but don't get damage. 
I've just uninstall the game and will never play it again! It's total garbage because of the hacks which are possible because Valve allows them, it does not make sense...
